title: Looking to recreate vintage RCA logo as closely as possible - Please help us finish our album artwork!
content:
hi,

i posted this earlier but, my picture didnt upload properly.

this handdrawn vintage RCA logo is an inspiration for our new album cover. if you can steer me towards a font that very closely resembles this logo. i'll give you a shout out in the credits!! the bands name is "ristband".

the upload didnt seem to work so i made the RCA logo my profile picture. hope this helps someone! THANKS AGAIN!

[gladtone@gmail.com](mailto:gladtone@gmail.com)

heres another link to the logo

[http://t1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:G\_CdM8ipAvFNmM%3Ahttp://www.audiotube...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018040004/http:/t1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:G_CdM8ipAvFNmM%3Ahttp://www.audiotubes.com/logorca.jpg "http://t1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:G\_CdM8ipAvFNmM%3Ahttp://www.audiotubes.com/logorca.jpg")
author: gladtone

comments.content:
I'd start with [Saturday Morning Toast](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018040004/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/saturday-morning-toast/) from Nick Curtis, and customize the 'A'.

- Lex
